descriptionHtml:
This Mod Adds A Few Things To Human Races.

1: A Hairstyle With Demonic Horns For Male And Female.
2: Red Demonic Eyes For Male And Female.
3: A Black And Red Skintone For Male And Female.

With These Things Added U Can Turn Your Character Into A Demon Like Figure.
It Is Cosmetic Only, So No New Powers.

A Sidenote: 

The Skintones (Sometimes) Don\'t Show When You Are In First Person.
Re-equipping Your Armor/Clothes Can Fix This.

The Skintones Dont Show When You Are A Vampire.
Then You Have The Default Skintone Of The Race You Are.

If Anyone Knows How I Can Fix This I Would Like To Know.

How To Install: Put The File In The Skyrim Data Folder.
author: JP0005
